title: Ultimate One Direction Quiz - Part 11
description: Test your knowledge of One Direction's music, lyrics, and song meanings with these 50 challenging questions!

questions.question: Which One Direction song includes the lyric 'You don't know you're beautiful'?
In 'Story of My Life', what does the narrator say he's been doing all his life?
Which song features the line 'I want to write you a song'?
questions.answer: I Want to Write You a Song

questions.question: In 'Night Changes', what does the song say changes?

In 'Perfect', what do they claim to be?
Which song includes the lyric 'You and me got a whole lot of history'?
In 'Live While We're Young', what do they suggest doing?
questions.answer: Going crazy, crazy, crazy till we see the sun
